mv X m/q
-- x.go --
package p

import "m/q"

func X() int {
	return q.Q + Y
}

var _ = X()
-- y.go --
package p

var Y int
-- q/q.go --
package q

var Q int
-- stderr --
-: import cycle not allowed: import stack: [m m/q m]
x.go:3:8: could not import m/q (import cycle: [m/q m])
ERROR: checking rewritten packages: errors found
-- stdout --
diff old/x.go new/x.go
--- old/x.go
+++ new/x.go
@@ -2,8 +2,4 @@

 import "m/q"

-func X() int {
-	return q.Q + Y
-}
-
-var _ = X()
+var _ = q.X()
diff old/q/q.go new/q/q.go
--- old/q/q.go
+++ new/q/q.go
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
 package q

+import p "m"
+
 var Q int
+
+func X() int {
+	return Q + p.Y
+}
